page.title: 18INFORMATION SYSTEMS COMPUTER
page.content: {Computers}are very helpful at school because information we might forget is kept in the computer memory. A popular use for computers is playing{games.}A good game is Chuckie Egg. You are Chuckie going along different levels collecting a dozen eggs. You score 100 points for each egg. If you collect purple seeds you gain more time and an extra 50 points. Another good game is Space Invaders where you have to shoot down five rows of spaceships and a mother ship. The mother ship is worth 200, 400, 800, or 1600 points, depending on how many ships are guarding it. The red, blue and brown spaceships are worth 20, 30 and 50 points respectively. You can use computers for many things including work and business. Big businesses have large and powerful computers and use{word processors.
